message.body: hello
Hey - how's it going?
As a heads up, I'm on jury duty today and will be in available between 230 and 500 today - the case will be tomorrow as well
oh ok thanks for telling me. im alright feeling a little out of sorts today
Why's that?
on antibiotics was in hospital last week with a perforated appendix:( the meds make be drowsy. on top of that i am a full time mom to a 9 month old
hope jury duty is fun never did it before just became a citizen a little over a year ago
Just got our first the day - it's fun to see the justice system at work and to be a part of it
I'm sorry you're not feeling well
Where are you from originally?
portugal
yea i oddly enough am looking forward to being a jury if i ever get a notice and can go i have lived here since age 10 so am very americanized
That great - what do you do now
work part time as office staff at a holistic health center and make painting and am at home w baby
will be going to grad school in sept to be an art psychotherapist and you
I work for a non profit organization that focuses on health care improvement
We try to cultivate and share the best ideas for improvement
wow sounds great!
What kind of painting do you do?
well heading to bed now talk to you in the am im up at 6 on most days so you can text any time have a good night
